docs.text:
Warning

This library is in early development and is not production-ready. Use at your own risk.

docs.title: What is Cardano N2N Client?
docs.text:
A simple(r) Cardano node-to-node client library in Haskell, wrapped around the cardano-node libraries.

This library allows you to connect to a Cardano node using the node-to-node protocol and perform chain synchronization.

Terminal
